document_data.mainbody:
he Hydras Den was a busy pub that stood in the south-western part of Hillsfar, not far from the Vault of Swords, a local temple of Tempus.
The Hydras Den offered several types of meals, catering to people of varied means. An average meal could cost up to 4 gold coins. Among libations severed, the tavern offered pink lemonade, beer, wine, and whiskey.
As of the , the tavern was a crowded establishment swirling with gossip. The taproom had individual tables, booths, and seats at the bar.
